name: Timepunks
description:
Made in 2 weeks for RevJam 2: The Jam to End the World

HOTFIX PATCH NOTES: 
  • Fixed several HARD crashes during the AI's turn.
  • Fixed a softlock when the AI tries to attack your units.
  • Fixed units getting their speed debuffed to 0, which caused the AI to softlock.
  • Fixed the Victory screen always displaying, even if you lost.
  • Fixed a softlock when the AI gets backed into a corner.
  • Fixed returning to the Main Menu prematurely on the final level.
  • NO new content/features/design changes/updated assets!!

(I only spent ~an hour and a half on it the morning after the deadline. So hopefully you'll consider streaming the Hotfix version instead!)

Missing features that will be added in Post-Jam updates:

  • Abilities! Play one per turn, instant effects on the battlefield.
  • Passive Unit effects instead of just raw stats.
  • Dialogue system and a proper story. Woah!
  • Local and Online multiplayer VS with deck and map editing.
  • Actual tile assets that aren't just recolored text. :V
